段: 逐擺日頭落山，日頭e5光照著門口埕牆圍仔e5時陣。你攏會聽著一陣真響e5吱吱聲，tui3門口埕牆圍仔角傳出來，這是啥麼聲音呢？這是肚蚓e5哭聲，伊na2哭na2講：目睭還我！目睭還我！這種聲音聽起來真悽涼，真可憐。

Tak8-pai2 jit8-thau5 loh8-suann1, jit8-thau5 e5 kng1 tsio3 tioh8 mng5-khau2-tiann5 tshiunn5-ui5-a2 e5 si5-tsun7. li2 long2 e7 thiann1 tioh8 tsit8 tin7 tsin1 hiang2 e5 ki1-ki1 siann1, tui3 mng5-khau2-tiann5 tshiunn5-ui5-a2 kak4 thuan5--tshut4-lai5, tse1 si7 siann2-mih4 siann1-im1 ne1? Tse1 si7 too7-un2 e5 khau3-siann1, i1 na2 khau3 na2 kong2: bak8-tsiu1 hing5 gua2! bak8-tsiu1 hing5 gua2! Tsit4 tsiong2 siann1-im1 thiann1--khi2-lai5 tsin1 tshi1-liang5, tsin1 kho2-lian5.

古早古早以前，肚蚓及蛇是tua3佇陸地e5朋友。彼個時陣，肚蚓有目睭，顛倒是蛇無目睭，蛇因為無目睭，m7-na7行動無方便，猶閣定定互蟾蜍、水雞欺負。Tsih4-tsuh4 e5水雞，不時放尿tiam3蛇e5身軀，凌遲kah4蛇歸身軀be7爽快。有一日早起，蛇hiong5-hiong5想著一個辦法，伊ka7肚蚓講：「肚蚓老大--e5，假使你兩蕊目睭借我一工，互我看一工即呢sui2 e5 世界m7知有偌好咧！猶閣我嘛想欲互遐e5使人討厭e5水雞，以後m7敢閣創治我。」無目睭e5蛇ka7頭伸高高，按呢siau3想講。肚蚓ka7蛇看一下，開嘴講：「好！m7-koh4我kan1-na7借你一工，到日頭落山e5時陣，目睭就愛還我。」

Koo2-tsa2 koo2-tsa2 i2-tsing5, too7-un2 kap4 tsua5 si7 tua3 ti7 liok8-te7 e5 ping5-iu2. hit4 e5 si5-tsun7, too7-un2 u7 bak8-tsiu1, tian1-to3 si7 tsua5 bo5 bak8-tsiu1, tsua5 in1-ui7 bo5 bak8-tsiu1, m7-na7 hing5-tong7 bo5 hong1-pian7, iau2 koh4 tiann7-tiann7 hoo7 tsiunn1-tsi5, tsui2-ke1 khi1-hu7. Tsih4-tsuh4 e5 tsui2-ke1, put4-si5 pang3-jio7 tiam3 tsua5 e5 sing1-khu1, ling5-ti7 kah4 tsua5 kui1-sin1-khu1 be7 song2-khuai3. u7 tsit8 jit8 tsa2-khi2, tsua5 hiong5-hiong5 siunn7 tioh8 tsit8 e5 pan7-huat4, i1 ka7 too7-un2 kong2: 'too7-un2 lau7-tua7--e5, ka2-su2 li2 nng7 lui2 bak8-tsiu1 tsioh4 gua2 tsit8 kang1, hoo7 gua2 khuann3 tsit8 kang1 tsiah4-nih4 sui2 e5 se3-kai3 m7 tsai1 u7 jua7 ho2 leh4! iau2 koh4 gua2 ma7 siunn7 beh4 hoo7 hia1 e5 su2-lang5 tho2-ia3 e5 tsui2-ke1, i2-au7 m7 kann2 koh4 tshong3-ti7 gua2. ' bo5 bak8-tsiu1 e5 tsua5 ka7 thau5 tshun1 kuan5-kuan5, an2-ne1 siau3-siunn7 kong2. too7-un2 ka7 tsua5 khuann3 tsit8-e7, khui1-tshui3 kong2: 'ho2! m7-koh4 gua2 kan1-na7 tsioh4 li2 tsit8 kang1, kau3 jit8-thau5 loh8-suann1 e5 si5-tsun7, bak8-tsiu1 tsiu7 ai3 hing5 gua2. '
蛇講日頭落山以前，伊一定會將目睭送轉來。軟心e5肚蚓忍痛將兩蕊目睭挖出來，鬥tiam3蛇頭e5兩個窟仔。講起來真奇怪，蛇隨時感覺目睭金金，看會著面頭前e5物件，伊歡喜kah4跳起來，雖然肚蚓猶佇伊e5後壁teh4 hainn1 痛，但是蛇已經暢kah4無聽著啊，同時也be7記得看即呢仔sui2 e5 世界咧！伊總是想：去tshue7水雞算帳！

Tsua5 kong2 jit8-thau5 loh8-suann1 i2-tsing5, i1 it4-ting7 e7 tsiong3 bak8-tsiu1 sang3--tng2-lai5. nng2-sim1 e5 too7-un2 jim2-thiann3 tsiong1 nng7 lui2 bak8-tsiu1 oo2--tshut4-lai5, tau3 tiam3 tsua5-thau5 e5 nng7 e5 khut4-a2. kong2--khi2-lai5 tsin1 ki5-kuai3, tsua5 sui5-si5 kam2-kak4 bak8-tsiu1 kim1-kim1, khuann3 e7 tioh8 bin7-thau5-tsing5 e5 mih8-kiann7, i1 huann-hi2 kah4 thiau3--khi2-lai5, sui1-jian5 too7-un2 iau2 ti7 i1 e5 au7-piah4 teh4 hainn1-thiann3, tan7-si7 tsua5 i2-king1 thiong3 kah4 bo5 thiann1 tioh8 a2, tong5-si5 ia7 be7-ki3-tit4 khuann3 tsiah4-ni5-a2 sui2 e5 se3-kai3 leh4! I1 tsong2-si7 siunn7: khi3 tshue7 tsui2-ke1 sng3-siau3!
就按呢蛇用ka7肚蚓借來e5目睭，四界去tshue7水雞算帳，起先蛇拄咬著水雞e5腳腿，愛水雞求伊諒情，後來伊感覺水雞e5肉誠甜，就一嘴將水雞吞落去腹肚。歸日咧，蛇食二、三十隻大細隻e5水雞、伊從來都m7 bat4食kah4即phang1-phai3。

Tsiu7 an2-ne1 tsua5 iong7 ka7 too7-un2 tsioh4--lai5 e5 bak8-tsiu1, si3-ke3 khi3 tshue7 tsui2-ke1 sng3-siau3, khi2-sian1 tsua5 tu2 ka7 tioh8 tsui2-ke1 e5 kha1-thui2, ai3 tsui2-ke1 kiu5 i1 liong7-tsing5, au7-lai5 i1 kam2-kak4 tsui2-ke1 e5 bah4 tsiann5 tinn1, tsiu7 chit8 tshui3 tsiong1 tsui2-ke1 thun1--loh8-khi3 pak4-too2. kui1-jit8 leh4, tsua5 tsiah8 ji7, sann-tsap8 tsiah4 tua7-se3 tsiah4 e5 tsui2-ke1, i1 tsiong5-lai5 to1 m7 bat4 tsiah8 kah4 tsiah4 phang1-phai3.

日頭欲落山啦，蛇想著應該將目睭還互肚蚓e5時陣到啦，但是伊閣自私咧想：有目睭實在誠好，我無愛閣再過彼種無目睭，烏天暗地e5日子，可憐e5肚蚓，我be7凍顧著你囉！就按呢忘恩背義e5蛇，將肚蚓e5目睭占做家己e5，呣還肚蚓。tui3彼日了後，每工日頭落山e5時陣，肚蚓就會哭：目睭還我！目睭還我！一日過一日，一年過一年，蛇已經be7記得還目睭e5代誌，可憐e5肚蚓逐日暗頭仔就teh4哭：目睭還我！目睭還我！

Jit8-thau5 beh4 loh8-suann1 lah4, tsua5 siunn7 tioh8 ing1-kai1 tsiong1 bak8-tsiu1 hing5 hoo7 too7-un2 e5 si5-tsun7 kau3--lah4, tan7-si7 i1 koh4 tsu7-su1 leh4 siunn7: u7 bak8-tsiu1 sit8-tsai7 tsiann5 ho2, gua2 bo5-ai3 koh4-tsai3 kue3 hit4 tsiong2 bo5 bak8-tsiu1, oo1-thinn1-am3-te7 e5 jit8-tsi2, kho2-lian5 e5 too7-un2, gua2 be7-tang3 koo3 tioh8 li2 lo5! tsiu7 an2-ne1 bong5-un1-pue7-gi7 e5 tsua5, tsiong1 too7-un2 e5 bak8-tsiu1 tsiam3 tso3 ka1-ki7 e5, m7 han5 too7-un2. tui3 hit4 jit8 liau2-au7, mui2-kang1 jit8-thau5 loh8-suann1 e5 si5-tsun7, too7-un2 to7 e7 khau3: bak8-tsiu1 hing5 gua2! bak8-tsiu1 hing5 gua2! tsit8 jit8 kue3 tsit8 jit8, tsit8 ni5 kue3 tsit8 ni5, tsua5 i2-king1 be7-ki3-tit4 hing5 bak8-tsiu1 e5 tai7-tsi3, kho2-lian5 e5 too7-un2 tak8-jit8 am3-thau5-a2 to7 teh4 khau3: bak8-tsiu1 hing5 gua2! bak8-tsiu1 hing5 gua2!
肚蚓無目睭，看be7著物件，無法度，只好鑽入去土底生活，土底e5烏暗世界，是m7免目睭e5，m7-koh4逐日暗頭仔，伊猶是會懷念伊e5兩蕊珍貴e5目睭。所以咱tsit4-mai2逐日暗頭仔e5時陣，猶會聽著肚蚓e5哭聲。

Too7-un2 bo5 bak8-tsiu1, khuann3 be7 tioh8 mih8-kiann7, bo5 huat-too7, tsi2-ho2 tsng3 jip8 khi3 thoo5-te2 sing1-uah8, thoo5-te2 e5 oo1-am3 se3-kai3, si7 m7 bian2 bak8-tsiu1 e5, m7-koh4 tak8-jit8 am3-thau5-a2, i1 iau2 si7 e7 huai5-liam7 i1 e5 nng7 lui2 tinn1-kui3 e5 bak8-tsiu1. soo2-i2 lan2 tsit4-mai2 tak8-jit8 am3-thau5-a2 e5 si5-tsun7, iau2 e7 thiann1 tioh8 too7-un2 e5 khau3-siann1.
雖然肚蚓失去目睭，土地公煞加互伊一條命，假使咱佇田裡做穡，無抵好將肚蚓切斷，切斷e5兩節肚蚓，m7-na7 be7死，無偌久猶會生出兩尾新肚蚓來，這是好心e5肚蚓，家己也想be7到--e5。

Sui1-jian5 too7-un2 sit4-khi3 bak8-tsiu1, thoo2-ti7-kong1 suah4 ke1 hoo7 i1 tsit8 tiau5 mia7, ka2-su2 lan2 ti7 tshan5-nih4 tsoh4-sit4, bo5 tu2-ho2 tsiong1 too7-un2 tshiat4 tng2, tshiat4 tng2 e5 nng7 tsat4 too7-un2, m7-na7 be7 si2, bo5 lua7 ku2 iau2 e7 senn1-tshut4 nng7 bue2 sin1 too7-un2 lai5, tse1 si7 ho2-sim1 e5 too7-un2, ka1-ki7 ia7 siunn7 be7 kau3--e5.

段: Kau2-kuai3 e5阿杰仔：
Kau2-kuai3 e5 a1-kiat8-a2:
上課鐘聲已經tan5，學生挨挨陣陣peh4tsiunn7大樓，突然間傳來一陣honn1-honn1叫的水螺聲，一直吼be7煞，閣有緊急e5播音聲：

Siong7-kho3 tsing1 siann1 i2-king1 tan5, hak8-sing1 e1-e1 tin7-tin7 peh4 tsiunn7 tua7-lau5, tut8-jian5-kan1 thuan5 lai5 tsit8 tsun7 honn1-honn1-kio3 e5 tsui2-le5 siann1, it4-tit8 hau2 be7 suah4, koh4 u7 kin2-kip4 e5 poo3-im1 siann1:
「緊急狀態！緊急狀態！有火災！有火災！」

「緊急狀態！緊急狀態！有火災！有火災！」

斡出教室門口看覓，原來大樓e5火災緊急警報器已經起動，斟酌看詳細，抑無啥原因？經過調查tshiah4知是學生阿杰仔kau2-kuai3去kang5tshih8開關，害逐家懷疑是啥代誌？

Uat4 tshut4 kau3-sik4 mng5-khau2 khuann3-mai7, guan5-lai5 tua7-lau5 e5 hue2-tsai1 kin2-kip4 king2-po3-khi3 i2-king1 khi2-tong7, tsim1-tsiok4 khuann3 siong5-se3, ah4 bo5 siann2 guan5-in1? King1-kue3 tiau1-tsa1 tshiah4 tsai1 si7 hak8-sing1 a1-kiat8-a2 kau2-kuai3 khi3 kang5 tshih8 khai1-kuan1, hai7 tak8-ke1 huai5-gi5 si7 siann2 tai7-tsi3?
Tann1無要緊，好佳哉無代誌，若是真正發生火災，逐家tioh8se3-ji7火災無情，燒起來m7是teh4滾笑，樓仔厝燒壞，錢銀財寶斷半屑，財產去了了，無厝thang1tua3，偌悽慘你敢知？

Tann1 bo5-iau3-kin2, ho2-ka1-tsai3 bo5 tai7-tsi3, na7 si7 tsin1-tsiann3 huat4-sing1 hue2-tsai1, tak8-ke1 tioh8 se3-ji7 hue2-tsai1 bo5-tsing5, sio1--khi2-lai5 m7 si7 teh4 kun2-tshio3, lau5-a2-tshu3 sio1 hai7, tsinn5-gin5 tsai5-po2 tng7-puann3-sut4, tsai5-san2 khu3 liau2-liau2, bo5 tshu3 thang1 tua3, lua7 tshi1-tsham2 li2 kam2 tsai1?
「老師！火燒厝真驚人--honn1？」
'Lau7-su1! hue2-sio1-tshu3 tsin1 kiann1-lang5 honn1?

「是--a7！火燭小心，小心火燭，囝仔人tioh8 m7-thang1烏白sng2火，「三年著賊偷，m7值一年火加落」，火燒厝e5損失，比著賊偷hoo7賊仔偷 theh8去--e5猶較嚴重，好佳哉m7是真正火燒厝，若無tioh8慘--a3，m7-koh4阿杰仔按呢作孽烏白tshih8開關，嘛是不應該，若是去hoo7消防警察聽著，起動消防隊員來救火，代誌tioh8大條--a7，阿杰仔！你知影m7著--無？去後壁罰徛，家己想看覓。」

' Si7--a7! hue2-tsik4 sio2-sim1, sio2-sim1 hue2-tsik4, gin2-a2-lang5 tioh8 m7-thang1 oo1-peh8 sng2-hue2, 'sann1 ni5 tioh8-tshat8-thau1, m7-tat8 tsit8 ni5 hue2-ka1-lauh8' , hue2-sio1-tshu3 e5 sun2-sit4, pi2 tioh8-tshat8-thau1 hoo7 tshat8-a2 thau1-theh8 khi3 e5 iau2 khah4 giam5-tiong7, ho2-ka-tsai3 m7 si7 tsin1-tsiann3 hue2-sio1-tshu3, na7-bo5 tioh8 tsham2--a3, m7-koh4 a1-kiat8-a2 an2-ne1 tsok4-giat8 oo1-peh8 tshih8 khai1-kuan1, ma7 si7 put4-ing1-kai1, na7 si7 khi3 hoo7 siau1-hong5 king2-tshat4 thiann1 tioh8, khi2-tang7 siau1-hong5 tui7-uan5 lai5 kiu3-hue2, tai7-tsi3 tioh8 tua7-tiau5--a7, a1-kiat8-a2! li2 tsai1-iann2 m7-tioh8 bo5? khi3 au7-piah4 huat8-khia7, ka1-ki7 siunn7 khuann3-mai7. '
